data.comment: The big names in today's match at Fisht Olympic Stadium have now been confirmed.
The match is underway at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
In the minute 1, Ball safe as Sochi is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ufa to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 3, Sochi have been awarded a corner by Nikolay Voloshin.
Danyl Prutsev of Sochi smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a Ufa throw-in in Sochi's half.
In the minute 8, Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
Throw-in for Ufa at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
In Sochi, Grigori Morozov of Ufa is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to Ufa.
Ufa's Vladislav Kamilov gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sochi defender.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 12, Nikolay Voloshin awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Sochi capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ufa's half?
Grigori Morozov (Ufa) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 15, Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Sochi.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
Free kick for Ufa in the half of Sochi.
In the minute 19, Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
Joaozinho's header is off-target for Sochi.
Nikolay Voloshin awards Ufa a goal kick.
In the minute 23, In Sochi Sochi drive forward through Artur Yusupov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Sochi.
Sochi have a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Sochi's Nikita Burmistrov has run offside.
Joaozinho for the home team is judged to be offside.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
Joaozinho (Sochi) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Sochi's Joaozinho is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 28, Attention is being given to Ufa’s Konstantin Pliyev and play has been suspended briefly.
Throw-in for Sochi in their own half.
Sochi are coming forward and Joaozinho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 31, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sochi.
Free kick Ufa.
Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Sochi.
In the minute 33, Ufa have been awarded a corner by Nikolay Voloshin.
Ufa's Konstantin Pliyev gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sochi goal kick.
In the minute 33, Ufa’s Konstantin Pliyev is on his feet again at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Sochi have a dangerous throw-in.
Artur Yusupov for Sochi drives towards goal at Fisht Olympic Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 35, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Miha Mevlja.
Miha Mevlja is back on his feet again.
Goal kick for Ufa at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
In the minute 38, Sochi awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ufa needs to be cautious. Sochi have an attacking throw-in.
In Sochi Sochi attack through Artur Yusupov. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 39, Ufa have a goal kick.
Throw-in Ufa.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Sochi.
In the minute 42, Ufa to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
Throw-in for Ufa at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
In the minute 43, Ball safe as Sochi is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nikolay Voloshin awards Ufa a goal kick.
Anton Zabolotnyi of Sochi gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sochi.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In Sochi a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Ufa at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
The first-half has ended.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 47, Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Sochi Sochi's Anton Zabolotnyi is caught offside.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 49, Nikolay Voloshin awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Ufa in the half of Sochi.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 53, Goal! Sergey Terekhov gives Sochi a 1-0 lead in Sochi.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a Ufa throw-in in Sochi's half.
Free kick Ufa.
In the minute 55, Ufa to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a Ufa throw-in in Sochi's half.
Throw-in for Ufa close to the penalty box.
In the minute 58, Sochi pushes forward through Anton Zabolotnyi, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
In the minute 63, Sochi's Joaozinho gets in a shot on goal at Fisht Olympic Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in Ufa.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
Corner awarded to Ufa.
Throw-in for Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 67, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sochi awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Sochi.
In the minute 69, Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Sochi.
Anton Zabolotnyi for Sochi is whistled offside.
Throw-in for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
In the minute 73, Sochi are pushing forward but Anton Zabolotnyi's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Ufa at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Oleg Danchenko is on a sub for Kirill Folmer for Ufa.
In the minute 74, Ufa make their second substitution with Artem Golubev replacing Akhmed Alibekov.
The away team have replaced Grigori Morozov with Vyacheslav Krotov. This is the third substitution made today by Rashid Rahimov.
Ufa have been awarded a corner by Nikolay Voloshin.
In the minute 77, Sochi's Anton Zabolotnyi breaks free at Fisht Olympic Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
The home team replace Nikita Burmistrov with Aleksandr Rudenko.
In the minute 77, Ibrahim Tsallagov is replacing Joaozinho for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 79, Sochi will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Ufa.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dmitri Sysuev is replacing Timur Zhamaletdinov for the away team.
Ivan Miladinovic (Sochi) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 80, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
Sochi have a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Sochi.
An attacking Ufa player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Komnen Andric scores from the spot to level the match at 1-1.
In the minute 88, Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
Throw-in for Ufa in their own half.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Fisht Olympic Stadium the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
Ufa drives forward and Dmitri Sysuev gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Nikolay Voloshin awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
Dmitri Sysuev is back on the pitch.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sochi.
Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nikolay Voloshin signals a throw-in for Ufa, close to Sochi's area.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
Dmitri Sysuev is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
